name: EntryPoint
description: An entry point, within some Web-based protocol.
title: EntryPoint

fields.name: urlTemplate
fields.title: urlTemplate
fields.description: An url template (RFC6570) that will be used to construct the target of the execution of the action.

fields.name: actionApplication
fields.title: actionApplication
fields.description: An application that can complete the request.

fields.name: application
fields.title: application
fields.description: An application that can complete the request.

fields.name: actionPlatform
fields.title: actionPlatform
fields.description: The high level platform(s) where the Action can be performed for the given URL. To specify a specific application or operating system instance, use actionApplication.

fields.name: httpMethod
fields.title: httpMethod
fields.description: An HTTP method that specifies the appropriate HTTP method for a request to an HTTP EntryPoint. Values are capitalized strings as used in HTTP.

fields.name: encodingType
fields.title: encodingType
fields.description: The supported encoding type(s) for an EntryPoint request.

fields.name: contentType
fields.title: contentType
fields.description: The supported content type(s) for an EntryPoint response.
